About Me

Hi, I'm Russ.

I am a front end developer based out of Cleveland, Ohio. Problem solving can be really fun, and coding has been one of the most rewarding ways to do it.

I started out doing software development. Most of the things I have done at the time were college projects, like making a calculator, a blackjack game, or something similar. In college, I used languages like Java, C#, C++, and Visual Basic.

After college, I started getting into the web development realm and this is really where I started to fall in love with coding. Designing and developing websites can be fun and very rewarding.

So what do you say, want to work with me to create the project of your dreams?
